ruleBookInfo.author:
li:matches(作者)@text||
p:matches(作者)@text||
div:not(:has(div)):matches(作者)@text
##作者：|简介.*
ruleBookInfo.intro:
li:matches(简介)@text||
p:matches(简介)@text||
div:not(:has(div)):matches(简介)@text
ruleBookInfo.name: title@text##\(.*|_.*|-.*|最新.*|无弹窗.*|完整.*|\:.*|全集.*|全文.*|免费.*|章节.*|免费.*|小说.*|,.*|txt.*

ruleToc.chapterList:
@css:*:has(>*:has(>a:matches(\d、|\d\.|第|分节|番外|\d{3,}))) a||
a[href~=\d+/\d+/\d+\.]||
a[href~=\d+/\d+\.]||
a[href~=\d{4,}]
